title: Tech Layoffs And Hiring Freezes Appear To Accelerate - Crunchbase News
content: Tech Layoffs And Hiring Freezes Appear To Accelerate  Crunchbase News
description: While earlier in the year, much of the talk in the tech sector focused on falling valuations, dropping stock prices and slower funding rounds, a lot of chatter the past two months has been around something that hits much closer to home for many peopleâ€”layoffs and hiring freezes.
